channel.title: A Nerd's Tale
channel.description: Recent content on A Nerd's Tale

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I am Kuntal, freshman at Delhi University, will be majoring in Computer Science, love working with statically typed languages, currently taking my time to understand how light bounces off the surface.

item.title: Do it, you may learn something
item.description: Frankly speaking computer graphics is a subject which is not appreciated by most of students who study computer science
